outcomeDescription: Outcome Description the character counts of your writing, simply copy and paste text into  tool To find out the word and character count of your writing, simply copy and paste text into the tool or write directly into the text area. Once done, the free online tool will display both counts for the text that's been inserted. This can be useful in many instances, but it can be especially helpful when you are writing for something that has a character minimum or limit.Character and word limits are quite common these days on the Internet.
